name: Jadevein Tea Eggs
description: A traditional snack that is widely popular in the streets and alleys of Liyue. The flavor of the tea seeps into the egg through cracks in its shell while it is boiling, and the cracks are as beautiful as the fractured patterns of jade.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Jadevein Tea Eggs
suspicious.description: A traditional Liyue snack. It tastes no different from a standard boiled egg. Did something go wrong with the tea leaves or the cooking process?
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 50 HP.

normal.name: Jadevein Tea Eggs
normal.description: A traditional snack that is widely popular in the streets and alleys of Liyue. The flavor of the tea seeps into the egg through cracks in its shell while it is boiling, and the cracks are as beautiful as the fractured patterns of jade.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.

delicious.name: Delicious Jadevein Tea Eggs
delicious.description: A traditional Liyue snack. The aroma of tea finds itself perfectly blended into the eggs. A dollop of deliciousness whether eaten all in one go or savored in small nibbles.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.
